Burner (http://burnerapp.com) -- Los Angeles, CA

We are a venture-backed company looking for strong mobile and server engineers who care about privacy and our mission to help users take control of their mobile identity.

For details on our open hires, please see http://web.burnerapp.com/careers/, but we always welcome people with interesting backgrounds who aren't an exact match for our posted roles.
